name: CoinRobot.AI
description: CoinRobot.AI (COINROBOT) is a cryptocurrency trading bot designed to automate trading activities using advanced blockchain and AI technology. The primary goal of this project is to increase the number of cryptocurrency coins held by users, rather than merely focusing on the growth of portfolio value. The bot is engineered to autonomously execute trades that result in a net increase in coins, even during market downturns.
